attributes.additional_details:
Today 19th October 2019 footage emerged of Diane Abbot clearly asleep in the Houses of Parliament during acruicial Brexit Debate.

I demand that Diane Abbott is immediately expelled for the Houses of Parliament and all of her benefits and privlidges revoked. This is a clear show of disrespect towards not only the House but the Government and the voting people of the United Kingdom. 

A front bench shadow minister should have more respect for her colleagues and has shown a total lack of respect.
attributes.background:
Today 19th October 2019 footage emerged of Diane Abbot clearly asleep in the Houses of Parliament during a cruicial Brexit Debate.

I demand that Diane Abbott is immediately expelled for the Houses of Parliament and all of her benefits  and privlidges revoked.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs and Shadow Ministers to be sacked.
